[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Tooltip](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.md)

## Tooltip namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bindMouseEvents(element)](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.bindmouseevents_1_function.md) | Binds the required mouse events onto an SVG element. |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.createdom_1_function.md) | Create the tooltip div and inject it onto the page. |
|  [getCustomTooltip()](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.getcustomtooltip_1_function.md) | Gets the custom tooltip function. |
|  [getDiv()](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.getdiv_1_function.md) | Returns the HTML tooltip container. |
|  [getTooltipOfObject(object)](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.gettooltipofobject_1_function.md) | Returns the tooltip text for the given element. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.hide_1_function.md) | Hide the tooltip. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.isvisible_1_function.md) | Returns whether or not a tooltip is showing |
|  [setCustomTooltip(customFn)](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.setcustomtooltip_1_function.md) | Sets a custom function that will be called if present instead of the default tooltip UI. |
|  [unbindMouseEvents(element)](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.unbindmouseevents_1_function.md) | Unbinds tooltip mouse events from the SVG element. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [HOVER\_MS](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.hover_ms_variable.md) | Delay before tooltip appears. |
|  [LIMIT](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.limit_variable.md) | Maximum width (in characters) of a tooltip. |
|  [MARGINS](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.margins_variable.md) | Horizontal padding between tooltip and screen edge. |
|  [OFFSET\_X](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.offset_x_variable.md) | Horizontal offset between mouse cursor and tooltip. |
|  [OFFSET\_Y](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.offset_y_variable.md) | Vertical offset between mouse cursor and tooltip. |
|  [RADIUS\_OK](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.radius_ok_variable.md) | Radius mouse can move before killing tooltip. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CustomTooltip](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.customtooltip_typealias.md) | A function that renders custom tooltip UI. 1st parameter: the div element to render content into. 2nd parameter: the element being moused over (i.e., the element for which the tooltip should be shown). |
|  [TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.tipinfo_typealias.md) | A type which can define a tooltip. Either a string, an object containing a tooltip property, or a function which returns either a string, or another arbitrarily nested function which eventually unwinds to a string. |
